text: Uncle Tupelo was an alternative country music group from Belleville, Illinois. The group was active between 1987 and 1994. Jay Farrar, Jeff Tweedy, and Mike Heidorn formed the band. Uncle Tupelo split on May 1, 1994. Farrar then formed Son Volt with Heidorn. The remaining members became Wilco. ==Albums== * No Depression (June 21, 1990) * Still Feel Gone (September 17, 1991) * March 16â€“20, 1992 (August 3, 1992) * Anodyne (October 5, 1993) Category:1987 establishments in Illinois Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:1994 disestablishments in the United States Category:American rock bands Category:Country bands Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1994 Category:Musical groups established in 1987 Category:Musical groups from Illinois Category:1990s disestablishments in Illinois
title: Uncle Tupelo
